subject: Doping (Sports)
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: If the laboratory in Moscow loses its accreditation from the World Anti-Doping Agency, the Sochi Games will be without a competent drug-testing facility in the country.
snippet: If the laboratory in Moscow loses its accreditation from the World Anti-Doping Agency, the Sochi Games will be without a competent drug-testing facility in the country.
